shopifyCollection.title: Best Sellers
shopifyCollection.description: Carefully curated based on the buying habits of strangers on the internet. Pennants, camp flags, banners and other fan favorites for gift ideas and home decor inspiration.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: Carefully curated based on the buying habits of strangers on the internet. Pennants, camp flags, banners and other fan favorites for gift ideas and home decor inspiration.

products.title: Together We Will See It Through Camp Flag
products.description: This design came to be in March 2020 and was partly inspired by a sign that was posted around Buffalo roughly 100 years ago — a period of time when the nation was recovering from both a World War and a pandemic. If you'd like to print out the design of this flag to color in, or hang in your window, download it here. Size: 18" x 24" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design Color: Cream body, Blue and Red details Ships with a pair of suction cup hooks to display flag on an exterior window.
products.descriptionHtml:
This design came to be in March 2020 and was partly inspired by a sign that was posted around Buffalo roughly 100 years ago — a period of time when the nation was recovering from both a World War and a pandemic. 

If you'd like to print out the design of this flag to color in, or hang in your window, download it here. 

Size: 18" x 24"

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design

Color: Cream body, Blue and Red details

Ships with a pair of suction cup hooks to display flag on an exterior window.

products.title: New York City Championship Banner
products.description: New York City has a few championship banners waving from the rafters, but now you can proudly hang your own custom NYC championship flag and show your love. Size: 24" x 30" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, and stitched design Color: Navy

products.title: Celebrate Everything 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle • Galison x Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: The Celebrate Everything 1000 Piece Puzzle in Square Box from features a collage of colorful pendants each with celebratory messages. Galison puzzles are packaged in matte-finish sturdy boxes, perfect for gifting, reuse, and storage. - Puzzle Size: 27 x 20", 686 x 508mm - Box Size: 8 x 8 x 1.5", 203 x 203 x 41mm - 1000 Pieces, Ribbon Cut - Includes Puzzle Insert with Full Puzzle Image - Minimal Puzzle Dust
products.descriptionHtml:
The Celebrate Everything 1000 Piece Puzzle in Square Box from features a collage of colorful pendants each with celebratory messages. Galison puzzles are packaged in matte-finish sturdy boxes, perfect for gifting, reuse, and storage.

- Puzzle Size: 27 x 20", 686 x 508mm 

- Box Size: 8 x 8 x 1.5", 203 x 203 x 41mm

- 1000 Pieces, Ribbon Cut

- Includes Puzzle Insert with Full Puzzle Image

- Minimal Puzzle Dust

products.title: Oxford Pennant Crewneck Sweatshirt
products.description: Pretend like you work here too (because let's be real, the employees only wear free Oxford stuff) with this cozy Oxford Pennant crew neck. If you really want to fit in, wear it 7 days a week (we don't judge!) Color: Gray crew neck, navy screen print
products.descriptionHtml:
Pretend like you work here too (because let's be real, the employees only wear free Oxford stuff) with this cozy Oxford Pennant crew neck. If you really want to fit in, wear it 7 days a week (we don't judge!) 

Color: Gray crew neck, navy screen print

products.title: Custom Hometown Banner
products.description: Our hometown banners, but this one has your hometown’s name on it. Check out the whole collection to see which hometowns we already have made up! Note seeing the colorways you want? Check out our custom dog name banner for other options! Size: 28 " x 6" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt Color: Pick from our options above Please note: our ability to customize colors is limited to the options above. Size cannot be changed. Max 12 characters. Turnaround time is 14-18 business days. All sales on custom pieces are final.
products.descriptionHtml:
Our hometown banners, but this one has your hometown’s name on it.
Check out the whole collection to see which hometowns we already have made up!

Note seeing the colorways you want? Check out our custom dog name banner for other options! 
Size: 28 " x 6" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt

Color: Pick from our options above

Please note: our ability to customize colors is limited to the options above. Size cannot be changed. Max 12 characters. Turnaround time is 14-18 business days. All sales on custom pieces are final.

products.title: Buffalo Mini Pennants
products.description: IYKYK (and if you don't know, then you're probably not from Buffalo). Originally made as part of our collaboration with the Buffalo Bills as a limited release. But they've been so popular we've decided to keep these mini pennants as a permanent part of the collection!These mini pennants are also available framed. If you'd like to print out the design of this pennant to color in, or hang in your window, download it here. Size: 4" x 9" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design Colors: Red, White, and Blue
products.descriptionHtml:
IYKYK (and if you don't know, then you're probably not from Buffalo). Originally made as part of our collaboration with the Buffalo Bills as a limited release. But they've been so popular we've decided to keep these mini pennants as a permanent part of the collection!These mini pennants are also available framed. 

If you'd like to print out the design of this pennant to color in, or hang in your window, download it here. 

Size: 4" x 9"  

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design

Colors: Red, White, and Blue

products.title: Every Day is a Gift Pennant •  Kelle Hampton x Oxford Pennant
products.description: This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome. A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education. Size: 9" x 27" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design Color: Navy
products.descriptionHtml:
This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome.  A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education.

products.title: Gift Card
products.description: Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with an Oxford Pennant gift card. Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.
products.descriptionHtml:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with an Oxford Pennant gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

This camp flag is also available as a stitched championship banner.

products.title: Happy Birthday Bunting
products.description: Forget the disposable decor that only lasts for one party and string this baby up for every birthday until you're 100 (or older)! Our colorful bunting is easy to store or leave it up all year because it looks cool and you deserve to be celebrated. Size: 38 inches long; pennants: 4" x 9" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt with screen-printed artwork Color: Crimson, Maroon, Old Gold, Forest, Turquoise, and Navy bodies; Cream details
products.descriptionHtml:
Forget the disposable decor that only lasts for one party and string this baby up for every birthday until you're 100 (or older)! Our colorful bunting is easy to store or leave it up all year because it looks cool and you deserve to be celebrated.

Size: 38 inches long; pennants: 4" x 9"

Material:  Cut-and-sewn wool felt with screen-printed artwork

Color: Crimson, Maroon, Old Gold, Forest, Turquoise, and Navy bodies; Cream details
